historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-193, see notes following § 34-1251.01.

References in Text

The Human Rights Act, referred to in subsec. (b), is the Human rights Act of 1977, D.C. Law 2-38, Dec. 13, 1977, 24 DCR 6038, which is classified to § 2- 1401.01 et seq.

DC CODE § 34-1262.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A cable operator shall not refuse to hire or employ, discharge, or otherwise discriminate against any person for any reason provided in Unit A of Chapter 14 of Title 2.
The provisions of the Human Rights Act shall apply to a cable operator.
